mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, APP_ID, ENT_ID, ROLE_CODE, ROLE_TITLE, ROLE_STATE, ROLE_DESC, IS_DELETE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ROLE_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, ROLE_TYPE_TITLE ,ORG_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ROLE_INFO.nextval AS roleId FROM dual
insert into role_info (ROLE_ID, APP_ID, ENT_ID, ROLE_CODE, ROLE_TITLE, ROLE_STATE, ROLE_DESC, IS_DELETE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) values (#{roleId}, #{appId}, #{entId}, #{roleCode}, #{roleTitle}, #{roleState}, #{roleDesc}, #{isDelete}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime})

SELECT SEQ_ROLE_INFO.nextval AS roleId FROM dual

ROLE_ID,
APP_ID,
ENT_ID,
ROLE_CODE,
ROLE_TITLE,
ROLE_STATE,

ORG_ID ,

mapper.update:
update role_info
APP_ID = #{appId},
ENT_ID = #{entId},
ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode},
ROLE_TITLE = #{roleTitle},
ROLE_STATE = #{roleState},
ROLE_DESC = #{roleDesc},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
STATUS = #{status},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime},
ROLE_TYPE = #{roleType},
START_TIME = #{startTime},
END_TIME = #{endTime},
ROLE_TYPE_TITLE = #{roleTypeTitle},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
where ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

update role_info set APP_ID = #{appId}, ENT_ID = #{entId}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode}, ROLE_TITLE = #{roleTitle}, ROLE_STATE = #{roleState}, ROLE_DESC = #{roleDesc}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete}, STATUS = #{status}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
mapper.select:
select
from role_info
OR ROLE_CODE LIKE '%' || #{roleCode} ||'%'
OR ROLE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{roleTitle} ||'%'
AND IS_DELETE = #{isDelete}

select rg.ROLE_GROUP_ID,r.* from role_info r LEFT JOIN acct_role_group_role ar on ar.role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_group rg on rg.role_group_id=ar.role_group_id where r.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and rg.IS_DELETE = 0

select ai.ACCT_ID from acct_info ai LEFT JOIN acct_role_real arr on ai.acct_id= arr.acct_id LEFT JOIN role_info ri on ri.role_id=arr.role_id where 1=1 and ai.IS_DELETE=0 and arr.role_id is not null
AND ri.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

SELECT C.ROLE_CODE FROM WARRANTY.ACCT_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.ACCT_ROLE_REAL B ON A.ACCT_ID = B.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.ROLE_INFO C ON B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID WHERE A.ACCT_ID = #{acctId} AND C.ROLE_CODE is not null
